snippets: If a weekly semaglutide dose is missed and the next scheduled dose is ≥48 hours away, take the missed dose as soon as possible. Otherwise, skip the missed dose and resume on the usual day. Do not administer two doses within 48 hours. (BNF Semaglutide, accessed 20 Jun 2025)
Advise patients to maintain diet and exercise and monitor blood glucose as usual after a missed dose; no additional dose adjustment required. (NICE NG28, 2023)
